name: NMB Payroll Report
query:
SELECT
    ep.employee AS "Employee ID",
    ep.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
    ep.payroll_cost_center AS "Payroll Cost Center",
    ep.bank_code AS "Bank Code",
    ep.bank_ac_no AS "Bank No",
    sp.net_pay AS "Net Pay:Currency:150",
    ep.bank_name AS "Bank Name"
FROM
    `tabSalary Slip` sp
INNER JOIN
    `tabEmployee` ep ON sp.employee = ep.name
WHERE
    ep.bank_name = "NMB" AND
    sp.start_date >= %(from_date)s AND sp.end_date <= %(to_date)s
